text: Umberto Lenzi (6 August 1931 â€“ 19 October 2017) was an Italian movie director and screenwriter. He was best known for his movies Cannibal Ferox, Nightmare City, and Ghosthouse. Lenzi died on 19 October 2017 in Rome at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Interview with Umberto Lenzion, 'Cultfilms en Kutfilms' (4 April 2008) Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian screenwriters
title: Umberto Lenzi
